definitions.definition: To make sweet to the taste.
To make (more) pleasant or to the mind or feelings.
To make mild or kind; to soften.
To make less painful or laborious; to relieve.
definitions.example: to sweeten the cares of life

definitions.definition: To soften to the eye; to make delicate.
To make pure and salubrious by destroying noxious matter.
definitions.example: to sweeten rooms or apartments that have been infected

definitions.definition: To restore to purity; to free from taint.
definitions.example: to sweeten water, butter, or meat

definitions.definition: To make more attractive; said of offers in negotiations.
